DOC.brief_summary: To determine wether multimodal MRI (conventinal T1 and T2 sequences, diffusion, magnetization transfer, spectroscopy) is reproducible; to follow up a cohort of patients with early remmittent MS after treatment with interferon.
DOC.brief_title: Multimodal MRI in Multiple Sclerosis (MS): Reliability and Follow Up
DOC.criteria: MS patients according to Poser's criteria Remitting evolution (less than two years of evolution) Aged 1850 Immunomodulatory treatment indicated Unable to perform MRI
DOC.keyword: less than two years of evolution
